title: Bobby Went Back To Hometown and Gave Shoes to Basketball Team + Amy was Afraid To Honk At Police Officer at Red Light + Someone Is Accused of Having Cosmetic Surgery
itunes:title: Bobby Went Back To Hometown and Gave Shoes to Basketball Team + Amy was Afraid To Honk At Police Officer at Red Light + Someone Is Accused of Having Cosmetic Surgery
description:
Bobby talks about going back to Mountain Pine for the high school basketball game this weekend. Each year he donates basketball shoes to them but this year he got to do it in person! Amy said she was behind an officer and the light turned green…but she wondered if it was okay to honk at them. Plus someone on the show is accused of getting their lips plumped up.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
